name: Photo Contest
rules: Submit one original photo related to the contest theme.
Photos must be taken by the entrant and must not be AI-generated.
No watermarks or identifying text allowed.
No copyrighted material or offensive content.
Winners will be selected based on creativity and composition.
Must be 18 years or older to enter.
Void where prohibited.

name: Art Contest
rules: Submit one original artwork (drawing, painting, digital, etc.).
All art must be created by the entrant and must not use AI tools.
Artwork should relate to the specified theme (if applicable).
Offensive or explicit content will be disqualified.
Entries will be judged on creativity, skill, and originality.
Must be 18 years or older to enter.
Void where prohibited.

name: Trivia Contest
rules: Submit answers to the official trivia questions provided.
Only one entry per person is allowed.
Answers must be submitted before the deadline to be considered.
Winners will be determined by the number of correct answers first, then time completed to the millisecond.
In the event of a tie, a random drawing will determine the winner.
Must be 18 years or older to enter.
Void where prohibited.

name: Caption Contest
rules: A photo will be provided for each contest.
Entrants must submit an original caption for the photo.
Captions must be family-friendly and not contain offensive language or content.
Each participant may submit only one caption per contest.
Captions are judged based on creativity, originality, and relevance to the photo.
At the end of the contest, the best caption as determined by the contest judges will win the entire prize pool.
Entries submitted after the contest deadline will not be considered.
By participating, you agree to abide by the official rules and the decisions of the contest administrators, which are final.
